column1: Natural Gas Trading Audit Report            D
column2: Legal does not maintain a  repository of approved confirmation templates.
column3: Legal should maintain copies of approved confirmation templates and periodically review confirmations (i.e. semi-annually or annually) sent to counterparties to ensure that the wording is current and applicable. In addition, for confirmations that require changes or additional verbiage to be added, management should determine the necessary documentation to be maintained in order to verify that legal has reviewed and approved those applicable confirmations.
